title: Mozilla says it's finally done with Onerep
summary:
Mozilla is finally ending its partnership with Onerep, an identity protection service, after a 16-month delay. The decision stems from a March 2024 KrebsOnSecurity investigation that revealed Onerep's founder, Dimitri Shelest, also created and operated numerous people-search services, including the active data broker Nuwber.

Despite initially announcing a wind-down in March 2024, Mozilla continued promoting Onerep. This week, Mozilla confirmed the partnership will officially conclude next month. As a result, its "Monitor Plus" service, which offered automated data removal via Onerep, will be discontinued.

Mozilla will continue to offer its free "Monitor" data breach service and aims to integrate more privacy features, such as its VPN, directly into Firefox. Current Monitor Plus subscribers will retain full access until December 17, 2025, after which they will receive prorated refunds. Mozilla stated that maintaining high vendor standards and the complexities of the data broker ecosystem made it challenging to consistently deliver expected value and reliability. Shelest had acknowledged his ownership stake in Nuwber, founded around the same time as Onerep in 2015.
chinese_title: 谋智表示终于与Onerep了结了
chinese_summary:
Mozilla 在拖延了16个月之后，终于终止了与身份保护服务 Onerep 的合作。该决定源于 KrebsOnSecurity 在2024年3月的一项调查，该调查揭示 Onerep 的创始人 Dimitri Shelest 还创建并运营了众多人员搜索服务，其中包括活跃的数据经纪公司 Nuwber。

尽管 Mozilla 最初在2024年3月宣布将逐步停止合作，但它却继续推广 Onerep。本周，Mozilla 证实该合作将于下个月正式结束。因此，其通过 Onerep 提供自动数据删除的“Monitor Plus”服务将停止。

Mozilla 将继续提供其免费的“Monitor”数据泄露服务，并计划将更多隐私功能（例如其 VPN）直接集成到 Firefox 中。现有的 Monitor Plus 订阅用户将保留全部访问权限直至2025年12月17日，此后将获得按比例退款。Mozilla 表示，维护高标准的供应商以及数据经纪生态系统的复杂性，使其难以持续提供预期的价值和可靠性。Shelest 曾承认他在 Nuwber 持有所有权股份，该公司于2015年与 Onerep 大致同时成立。

title: McDonald's is losing its low-income customers
summary:
Fast-food prices have risen significantly, causing McDonald's and the broader industry to lose their core low-income customer base. These patrons are increasingly being replaced by higher earners, a trend confirmed by McDonald's CEO Christopher Kempczinski, who noted a double-digit drop in low-income traffic.

The average McDonald's menu item price increased by 40% from 2019 to 2024. This surge is attributed to soaring costs for restaurant essentials like labor and beef (due to drought, tariffs, and alleged price-fixing in the meat industry), compounded by general inflation in housing, childcare, and groceries.

Low-income households, particularly those earning under $45,000 annually, are severely impacted. They face "huge year-over-year increases" in credit delinquencies, and half of all renters are cost-burdened, spending over 30% of their income on housing. For those earning under $30,000, residual income for other needs has plummeted to a median of just $250 per month. This highlights a "K-shaped economy" where wealthier consumers maintain spending while lower-income individuals pull back.

Historically, McDonald's saw a major turnaround in the early 2000s with its Dollar Menu, specifically appealing to budget-conscious consumers. However, this menu became unsustainable due to inflation. Recent attempts by McDonald's to attract cash-strapped customers with $5 deals and other value offers have yielded mixed results, despite a recent modest sales lift.

Economists warn that economic and policy headwinds disproportionately affect lower-income households, making affordability a pressing issue. Businesses are wary of passing on further price increases, recognizing that consumers have little tolerance left after years of inflation.
chinese_title: 麦当劳正在失去低收入顾客
chinese_summary:
快餐价格大幅上涨，导致麦当劳和整个行业失去了其核心的低收入客户群。这些顾客正越来越多地被高收入者取代，麦当劳首席执行官克里斯托弗·肯普钦斯基证实了这一趋势，他指出低收入顾客流量出现了两位数的下降。

从2019年到2024年，麦当劳菜单商品的平均价格上涨了40%。这一涨幅归因于劳动力和牛肉等餐厅必需品成本的飙升（受干旱、关税以及肉类行业涉嫌价格操纵的影响），同时住房、育儿和食品杂货等方面的普遍通胀也加剧了这一情况。

低收入家庭，特别是年收入低于4.5万美元的家庭，受到了严重影响。他们面临信贷违约“同比大幅增长”的情况，并且一半的租房者承受着过高的租金负担，将超过30%的收入用于住房。对于年收入低于3万美元的人来说，用于其他需求的剩余收入已降至每月中位数仅250美元。这凸显了“K型经济”的特点，即富裕消费者保持消费，而低收入个人则削减开支。

历史上，麦当劳在21世纪初通过其“一元菜单”实现了重大转机，特别吸引了精打细算的消费者。然而，由于通货膨胀，这一菜单变得不可持续。麦当劳最近尝试通过5美元套餐和其他超值优惠来吸引手头拮据的顾客，尽管近期销售额略有提升，但结果喜忧参半。

经济学家警告称，经济和政策逆风不成比例地影响着低收入家庭，使得可负担性成为一个紧迫的问题。企业不愿进一步转嫁价格上涨的成本，因为他们认识到，在经历了多年的通货膨胀后，消费者已所剩无几的忍耐度。

title: RFK Jr.'s loathesome edits: CDC website now falsely links vaccines and autism
summary:
Under Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s leadership as the country’s top health official, the CDC's "Autism and Vaccines" webpage was abruptly changed to falsely suggest a link between vaccines and autism. Previously, the site accurately stated that studies show "no link between receiving vaccines and developing autism spectrum disorder (ASD)." Now, it claims that "The claim ‘vaccines do not cause autism’ is not an evidence-based claim because studies have not ruled out the possibility that infant vaccines cause autism."

This move is predicted to sow distrust, erode vaccination rates, and lead to more disease. HHS attributed the changes to "gold standard, evidence-based science," but career CDC scientists reportedly were not consulted. The updated page cherry-picks fringe studies, misrepresents old data, and falsely implicates aluminum adjuvants, even in vaccines that don't contain them. It ignores a recent high-quality study of 1.2 million children refuting the aluminum link, which Kennedy had unsuccessfully demanded be retracted.

Medical experts have expressed dismay and anger. The American Academy of Pediatrics, through its President Susan Kressly, blasted the changes, reiterating that over 40 high-quality studies involving 5.6 million people confirm "no link between vaccines and autism." Kressly accused those promoting the myth of being "misinformed or intentionally trying to mislead parents" and urged the CDC to stop amplifying false claims.
chinese_title: 小罗伯特·F·肯尼迪的恶劣修改：疾控中心网站现竟虚假地将疫苗与自闭症联系起来
chinese_summary:
在小罗伯特·F·肯尼迪担任该国最高卫生官员的领导下，疾控中心（CDC）的“自闭症与疫苗”网页突然被修改，错误地暗示疫苗与自闭症之间存在关联。此前，该网站准确指出研究显示“接种疫苗与患上自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）之间没有关联”。现在，它声称“‘疫苗不会导致自闭症’这一说法并非基于证据的主张，因为研究尚未排除婴儿疫苗导致自闭症的可能性。”

预计此举将播下不信任的种子，侵蚀疫苗接种率，并导致更多疾病。卫生与公众服务部（HHS）将这些修改归因于“黄金标准、循证科学”，但据报道，疾控中心的职业科学家并未被征求意见。更新后的页面断章取义地选择边缘研究，歪曲旧数据，并错误地牵连铝佐剂，甚至在不含铝佐剂的疫苗中也如此。它忽视了一项近期针对120万儿童的高质量研究，该研究驳斥了铝的关联性，而肯尼迪曾要求撤回该研究但未成功。

医学专家对此表示震惊和愤怒。美国儿科学会通过其主席苏珊·克雷斯利（Susan Kressly）严厉抨击了这些修改，重申超过40项涉及560万人的高质量研究证实“疫苗与自闭症之间没有关联”。克雷斯利指责那些宣扬这一神话的人“要么被误导，要么是蓄意误导家长”，并敦促疾控中心停止放大虚假主张。

title: Gmail can read your emails and attachments to train its AI, unless you opt out
summary:
Google has reportedly started automatically opting Gmail users in to allow their private messages and attachments to be used for training its AI models, including Gemini. This move, aimed at powering new Gmail features like Smart Compose and AI-generated replies, means user data could be analyzed to refine Google's AI assistants.

The change is rolling out quietly, with settings switched on by default, requiring users to manually opt out if they don't want their emails used for AI training. While Google promises privacy measures like anonymization, the lack of explicit consent and the use of sensitive information raise significant privacy concerns for many, despite the potential for smarter, more personalized Gmail features.

To fully opt out, users must adjust settings in two separate locations:
1.  **Turn off "Smart Features in Gmail, Chat, and Meet"**: Go to Gmail settings, find this section, uncheck the option, and save.
2.  **Turn off "Google Workspace smart features"**: Still in settings, navigate to "Manage Workspace smart feature settings," and toggle off both "Smart features in Google Workspace" and "Smart features in other Google products," then save.

It's crucial to disable both as one covers Workspace apps (email, chat, meet) and the other covers smart features across other Google products. Users should verify that both toggles remain off. Google is gradually rolling this out, so while settings might not be enabled for everyone yet, checking them is advised for privacy-conscious individuals.
chinese_title: Gmail 可以读取你的电子邮件和附件来训练其人工智能，除非你选择退出。
chinese_summary:
谷歌据报道已开始默认让Gmail用户选择加入，允许其私人邮件和附件用于训练包括Gemini在内的人工智能模型。此举旨在为Gmail的新功能（如智能撰写和AI生成回复）提供支持，意味着用户数据可能被分析以改进谷歌的AI助手。

这一改变正在悄然推出，设置默认开启，用户若不希望自己的邮件被用于AI训练，需要手动选择退出。尽管谷歌承诺采取匿名化等隐私措施，但缺乏明确同意和敏感信息的使用，引发了许多人对隐私的重大担忧，即便这可能带来更智能、更个性化的Gmail功能。

要完全选择退出，用户必须在两个不同的位置调整设置：
1.  **关闭“Gmail、Chat 和 Meet 中的智能功能”**：前往Gmail设置，找到此部分，取消勾选该选项并保存。
2.  **关闭“Google Workspace 智能功能”**：仍在设置中，导航至“管理 Workspace 智能功能设置”，然后关闭“Google Workspace 中的智能功能”和“其他 Google 产品中的智能功能”这两个选项，并保存。

同时禁用这两个选项至关重要，因为一个涵盖Workspace应用（邮件、聊天、会议），另一个则涵盖其他Google产品中的智能功能。用户应核实这两个开关都保持关闭状态。谷歌正在逐步推行此功能，因此虽然并非所有用户的设置都已启用，但建议关注隐私的用户检查一下。

title: EXIF orientation info in PNGs isn't used for image-orientation: from-image
summary:
This bug report, titled "EXIF orientation info in PNGs isn't used for image-orientation: from-image," describes an issue where browsers, specifically Firefox, fail to correctly orient PNG images based on their embedded EXIF data when `image-orientation: from-image` is applied.

Filed by Eric Portis five years ago, the reporter demonstrated that a JPEG and a PNG, both containing the same EXIF "Rotate 90 CW" orientation information, displayed differently in browsers. The JPEG rotated correctly, but the PNG did not, contrary to expectations.

Further investigation revealed that while the PNG specification (PNG-3) defines an `eXIf` chunk for EXIF data, its placement within the file (before or after image data) affected browser interpretation. At the time, Firefox and Chrome did not respect EXIF orientation in PNGs at all, while Safari only did if the EXIF data appeared before the image data. The `eXIf` chunk was noted as a valid, though less common, PNG extension.

The bug's status changed over time, blocking several other related issues. It was eventually marked "RESOLVED DUPLICATE" two months ago, indicating that the problem was addressed and fixed as part of another bug, Bug 1682759. This suggests that the capability to properly interpret EXIF orientation in PNGs is now expected to be implemented.
chinese_title: PNG图像中的EXIF方向信息不用于`image-orientation: from-image`。
chinese_summary:
这份题为“PNG中的EXIF方向信息未用于`image-orientation: from-image`”的bug报告，描述了一个问题，即当应用`image-orientation: from-image`时，浏览器（尤其是Firefox）未能根据PNG图像中嵌入的EXIF数据正确地调整其方向。

该报告由Eric Portis于五年前提交，报告者演示了包含相同EXIF“旋转90度顺时针”方向信息的一张JPEG图像和一张PNG图像在浏览器中显示不同。JPEG图像正确旋转，而PNG图像则没有，这与预期相反。

进一步调查显示，尽管PNG规范（PNG-3）为EXIF数据定义了一个`eXIf`数据块，但它在文件中的位置（在图像数据之前或之后）影响了浏览器的解释。当时，Firefox和Chrome完全不遵守PNG中的EXIF方向信息，而Safari只有当EXIF数据出现在图像数据之前时才遵守。`eXIf`数据块被认为是一个有效但不太常见的PNG扩展。

这个bug的状态随着时间而改变，阻塞了其他几个相关问题。它最终在两个月前被标记为“RESOLVED DUPLICATE”（已解决，重复），表明该问题已作为另一个bug（Bug 1682759）的一部分得到处理和修复。这表明，现在预计已实现正确解释PNG中EXIF方向信息的功能。

title: Brexit Hit to UK Economy Double Official Estimate, Study Finds
summary:
A new study co-authored by a senior Bank of England economist suggests Brexit has inflicted almost double the economic damage on the UK compared to official estimates.

The research, presented to the Office for Budget Responsibility (OBR), calculates that the 2016 vote to leave the European Union has cost the UK between 6% and 8% of GDP per person over the past decade. This translates to an economic hit ranging from £180 billion ($235 billion) to £240 billion. In contrast, the OBR, the government’s independent forecaster, currently estimates the damage at 4% of GDP.
chinese_title: 脱欧冲击英国经济达官方估算两倍，研究发现
chinese_summary:
一项由英格兰银行高级经济学家合著的新研究表明，与官方估计相比，英国脱欧给英国造成的经济损失几乎是官方估计的两倍。

该研究已提交给预算责任办公室（OBR），并计算得出，2016年投票脱离欧盟在过去十年中使英国人均GDP损失了6%至8%。这相当于1800亿英镑（2350亿美元）到2400亿英镑的经济损失。相比之下，预算责任办公室（OBR）——政府的独立预测机构——目前估计损失为GDP的4%。

title: ADHD and monotropism (2023)
summary:
The article explores the potential link between ADHD and monotropism, a theory initially formulated to explain autistic experiences as a tendency to concentrate attention on a small number of things. Despite differing diagnostic criteria – ADHD as attentional, autism as social, with seemingly contradictory traits like rigid interests versus impulsivity – many diagnosed with ADHD identify strongly with monotropism.

The author, Fergus Murray, suggests that autism and ADHD, or "Kinetic Cognitive Style (KCS)," might share an underlying monotropic cause. He proposes that ADHD traits like impulsivity, inattention, and hyperactivity could stem from a monotropic processing style. Impulsivity might arise from losing awareness when attention shifts, and inattention from profound difficulty redirecting attention away from current interests. Hyperactivity, whether a need to move (like stimming) or cognitive "attention-hopping," can be reconciled by considering monotropism combined with factors like difficulty accessing flow states, high novelty-seeking, or rapid "serial monotropism."

The article notes that outward presentation heavily influences current diagnoses, potentially masking underlying monotropic cognitive styles in individuals who develop coping mechanisms. While speculative, the significant overlap and strong correlation between monotropism and both ADHD and autism warrant extensive future research to understand these neurodivergences from an internal, cognitive perspective rather than solely surface-level observations.
chinese_title: 注意力缺陷多动障碍 和 单一模式 (2023)
chinese_summary:
文章探讨了注意力缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）与单向聚焦理论之间的潜在联系，后者最初是为解释自闭症体验而提出的，即倾向于将注意力集中在少数事物上。尽管诊断标准不同——ADHD侧重于注意力，自闭症侧重于社交，且存在刻板兴趣与冲动性等看似矛盾的特质——许多被诊断为ADHD的人强烈认同单向聚焦理论。

作者弗格斯·默里提出，自闭症和ADHD，或称“动力认知风格（KCS）”，可能共享一个潜在的单向聚焦原因。他认为，ADHD的特质，如冲动性、注意力不集中和多动性，可能源于一种单向聚焦的处理风格。冲动性可能源于注意力转移时意识的丧失，而注意力不集中则源于难以将注意力从当前兴趣中转移开。多动性，无论是需要移动（如刻板行为）还是认知上的“注意力跳跃”，都可以通过将单向聚焦理论与难以进入心流状态、高度寻求新奇或快速的“连续单向聚焦”等因素结合起来加以调和。

文章指出，外在表现严重影响当前的诊断，这可能掩盖了那些发展出应对机制的个体中潜在的单向聚焦认知风格。尽管具有推测性，但单向聚焦理论与ADHD和自闭症之间显著的重叠和强烈相关性，值得未来进行广泛研究，以从内部、认知的角度而非仅仅是表面观察来理解这些神经多样性。

title: 'The French people want to save us': help pours in for glassmaker Duralex
summary:
French glassmaker Duralex, a brand evoking deep nostalgia and national pride, experienced an astonishing outpouring of public support, raising its €5 million emergency funding target in just five hours and 40 minutes. Pledges subsequently soared to over €19 million, though as a staff cooperative, Duralex could only accept the initial €5 million.

Director General François Marciano stated the response "astonished everyone," attributing it to "The French people want to save us. They are fed up with factories closing." This success comes after Duralex faced receivership four times in two decades, with Marciano leading a staff buyout 18 months ago, making 180 of 243 employees associates.

The appeal sparked a "tsunami of orders," with the factory now struggling to keep up. Duralex is renowned for its highly durable, microwave, freezer, and dishwasher-safe glassware, particularly the iconic Picardie tumbler, celebrated as a design classic. The manufacturing process, largely unchanged since 1945, involves heating raw materials to 1,400C and rigorous quality control.

Despite the fundraising boost, high gas and electricity costs remain a significant concern. The €5 million will fund factory modernization and new products, including a partnership with the Élysée presidential palace and plans for international expansion into the UK and US with pint glasses, acknowledging the challenge of building brand recognition abroad. The company hopes to break even by 2027, having already seen turnover increase by 22% since becoming a co-op.
chinese_title: “法国人想救我们”：玻璃制造商杜拉丽获援助如潮
chinese_summary:
法国玻璃制造商杜拉乐士（Duralex）是一个唤起人们深深怀旧情感和民族自豪感的品牌，它获得了惊人的公众支持，仅在5小时40分钟内就筹集到了500万欧元的紧急资金目标。随后的认捐额飙升至逾1900万欧元，但作为一家员工合作社，杜拉乐士只能接受最初的500万欧元。

总经理弗朗索瓦·马西亚诺表示，这一反响“让所有人感到震惊”，他将其归因于“法国人民想拯救我们。他们厌倦了工厂倒闭。”这一成功是在杜拉乐士在二十年内四次面临破产管理之后取得的，马西亚诺在18个月前领导了一次员工收购，使243名员工中的180人成为合作社成员。

这次呼吁引发了“订单海啸”，工厂现在难以跟上生产。杜拉乐士以其高度耐用、可用于微波炉、冰箱和洗碗机的玻璃器皿而闻名，尤其是其标志性的皮卡第（Picardie）玻璃杯，被誉为设计经典。其制造工艺自1945年以来基本未变，包括将原材料加热到1400摄氏度以及严格的质量控制。

尽管筹集到了资金，高昂的天然气和电力成本仍然是一个重大担忧。这500万欧元将用于工厂现代化改造和新产品开发，包括与爱丽舍宫（法国总统府）的合作，并计划通过品脱杯进军英国和美国市场，同时认识到在海外建立品牌知名度的挑战。该公司希望到2027年实现收支平衡，自成为合作社以来，其营业额已增长了22%。

title: Germany: States Pass Porn Filters for Operating Systems
summary:
The German states (Länder) have passed a bill requiring operating systems sold in Germany to include a pre-installed "porn filter" as part of their youth protection measures. This filter, aimed at blocking "youth-endangering content," would be inactive by default and require explicit activation by the user, likely involving an age verification process.

The proposal has drawn significant criticism, particularly from the Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and other digital rights advocates. Critics argue that such filters are technically ineffective, easily circumvented, and could create a false sense of security while potentially leading to censorship or surveillance. They also raise concerns about the technical feasibility for operating system manufacturers and the broad definition of "youth-endangering content."

Despite these objections, the states' decision reflects an ongoing effort to enhance youth protection online. The bill is not yet law and must still undergo further legislative stages, including approval by the Bundestag, before it can be enacted. The debate highlights the tension between safeguarding minors and upholding digital freedoms and technical realities.
chinese_title: 德国：各州通过操作系统色情过滤器
chinese_summary:
德国各州（Länder）通过了一项法案，要求在德国销售的操作系统必须包含一个预装的“色情过滤器”，作为其青少年保护措施的一部分。该过滤器旨在屏蔽“危害青少年内容”，默认情况下处于非活动状态，需要用户明确激活，这可能涉及年龄验证过程。

该提案遭到了大量批评，特别是来自混沌电脑俱乐部（CCC）和其他数字权利倡导者的批评。批评者认为，此类过滤器在技术上无效，易于规避，并可能制造一种虚假的安全感，同时可能导致审查或监控。他们还对操作系统制造商的技术可行性以及“危害青少年内容”的宽泛定义表示担忧。

尽管存在这些反对意见，但各州的决定反映了其在加强在线青少年保护方面的持续努力。该法案尚未成为法律，在生效前仍需经过进一步的立法阶段，包括获得联邦议院的批准。这场辩论凸显了保护未成年人与维护数字自由及技术现实之间的紧张关系。

title: Roblox CEO Makes a Fool of Himself in Car-Crash Interview
summary:
Roblox CEO David Baszucki gave a widely criticized "car-crash" interview on the New York Times' Hard Fork podcast, discussing child safety amidst mounting legal pressure and accusations of being a "pedophile hellscape." Roblox is implementing new facial recognition for chat age verification, but Baszucki's responses were deemed tone-deaf and incoherent.

When questioned about the "scope of the problem" of predators, Baszucki astonishingly called it an "opportunity." He provided vague answers regarding the new ID checks and deflected questions about the 19-year delay in implementing basic safety measures, often citing Roblox's 150 million users as an excuse. Pressed on the ineffectiveness of existing filters, he became incoherent, refusing to comment on lawsuits and suggesting "sophisticated" users or older kids bypass filters. He denied a predator problem, focusing instead on "innovation."

Later, Baszucki became openly hostile and immature when discussing a Hindenburg Research report on safety spending, demanding the interviewer agree that AI, now central to Roblox's safety strategy, was superior, and sarcastically demanding "high-fives." Most controversially, he expressed interest in integrating Polymarket, a cryptoscam-based prediction market, into Roblox for children to "gamble" in "legal" and "educational" ways, a suggestion openly mocked by the hosts. The article concludes Baszucki remains unprepared and out of touch with his platform's severe safety issues, prioritizing growth and investor concerns over child protection.
chinese_title: 罗布乐思CEO在翻车采访中出洋相
chinese_summary:
罗布乐思首席执行官戴维·巴斯祖奇在《纽约时报》的《Hard Fork》播客上接受了一次备受批评的“灾难性”采访，他在日益增加的法律压力和被指控为“恋童癖地狱”的背景下，讨论了儿童安全问题。罗布乐思正在推行新的面部识别技术用于聊天年龄验证，但巴斯祖奇的回应被认为是不合时宜且语无伦次的。

当被问及掠食者的“问题范围”时，巴斯祖奇竟将其称作一个“机会”。他对新的身份验证措施含糊其辞，避开关于在实施基本安全措施方面19年延误的问题，经常以罗布乐思拥有1.5亿用户作为借口。当被追问现有过滤器的无效性时，他变得语无伦次，拒绝评论诉讼，并暗示“老练”的用户或年龄较大的孩子会绕过过滤器。他否认存在掠食者问题，反而将重点放在“创新”上。

后来，当讨论兴登堡研究公司关于安全开支的报告时，巴斯祖奇变得公然带有敌意且不成熟，他要求采访者同意人工智能（现在是罗布乐思安全战略的核心）是优越的，并嘲讽地要求“击掌”。最具争议的是，他表示有兴趣将基于加密骗局的预测市场Polymarket整合到罗布乐思中，让孩子们以“合法”和“教育性”的方式“赌博”，这一提议被主持人公开嘲笑。文章总结称，巴斯祖奇对他平台严重的安全性问题仍然毫无准备且脱节，优先考虑增长和投资者担忧，而非儿童保护。

title: We remain alive also in a dead internet
summary:
Slavoj Žižek's "Why we remain alive also in a dead internet" delves into the popular "dead internet theory"—the notion that the internet is now predominantly populated by AI-generated content and bots, diminishing authentic human interaction. Rather than dismissing this as a mere conspiracy, Žižek uses it as a philosophical springboard, interpreting it through the lens of Lacanian psychoanalysis.

He posits that the internet is not truly "dead" but "undead," much like a zombie. This "undead" quality, Žižek argues, mirrors Lacan's concept of "the Real"—a traumatic, meaningless, and intrusive presence that resists symbolization and imagination. The deluge of AI content represents a new manifestation of this Real, a constant "gaze" that subtly shapes our perceptions and desires, even when we recognize its artificiality.

Žižek contends that this "dead internet" compels us not to simply reject AI or retreat into a search for pure human authenticity. Instead, it challenges us to confront the inherent "deadness" or "lack" that exists even within human reality itself. True human freedom and aliveness, he suggests, lie in recognizing and engaging with this "undead" dimension of both the digital realm and our own subjectivity, allowing it to reframe our understanding of what it means to be alive and to foster new forms of creativity and connection.
chinese_title: 我们也在一片死寂的互联网中依然存活。
chinese_summary:
斯拉沃热·齐泽克的《为何我们仍在“死寂互联网”中生存》深入探讨了流行的“死寂互联网理论”——即互联网如今主要由AI生成内容和机器人占据，从而减少了真实的人类互动。齐泽克并未将其斥为单纯的阴谋论，而是将其作为哲学跳板，通过拉康精神分析的视角进行解读。

他提出互联网并非真正“已死”，而是“不死”，如同僵尸一般。齐泽克认为，这种“不死”的特质映照了拉康的“实在界”（the Real）概念——一个创伤性、无意义、侵入性的存在，它抵抗符号化和想象。大量的AI内容代表了这种实在界的一种新表现，一种持续的“凝视”（gaze），即使我们认识到其人工性，它也悄然塑造着我们的感知和欲望。

齐泽克主张，这个“死寂互联网”并非促使我们简单地拒绝AI或退回到对纯粹人类真实性的追求。相反，它挑战我们去正视即使在人类现实本身中也存在的内在“死寂”或“匮乏”（lack）。他指出，真正的人类自由和生命力在于认识并参与到数字领域和我们自身主体性的这种“不死”维度中，让它重新定义我们对“活着”的理解，并培育新形式的创造力和联结。

title: Private Equity's New Venture: Youth Sports
summary:
Private equity firms are increasingly dominating the $40 billion youth sports industry, transforming it into a profit-driven venture that is pricing out many families. A prime example is the growing trend of corporate-owned facilities and leagues, particularly in hockey, banning parents from recording their children's games. Instead, companies like Black Bear Sports Group, the largest owner-operator of hockey rinks, force parents to subscribe to their exclusive streaming services, which can cost significantly more than subscriptions for professional sporting events.

Senator Chris Murphy (D-CT) highlighted this issue, recounting threats that his child's team would be penalized for unauthorized livestreaming at a Black Bear-owned rink. Black Bear also implements additional fees, such as a $50 "registration and insurance" charge, adding to already skyrocketing costs in youth sports. The average family now spends over $1,000 annually on a child's primary sport, with hockey averaging over $2,500, making it inaccessible for lower-income families.

Other firms, like Unrivaled Sports and Bain Capital-backed Varsity Brands (cheerleading), employ similar tactics, consolidating markets, controlling venues, equipment, and streaming rights. Varsity Brands even faced an antitrust lawsuit for alleged anticompetitive practices. Critics argue that these private equity strategies prioritize investor profits over children's development, leading to degraded services and creating an "affordability crisis" that turns youth sports into a luxury activity.
chinese_title: 私募股权新业务：青少年体育
chinese_summary:
私募股权公司正日益主导价值400亿美元的青少年体育产业，将其转变为以利润为导向的商业企业，令许多家庭望而却步。一个主要例子是，企业拥有的设施和联盟——尤其是在冰球运动中——日益普遍地禁止家长录制孩子比赛。相反，像最大的冰球场馆所有者兼运营商Black Bear Sports Group这样的公司，强迫家长订阅他们独有的流媒体服务，其费用可能远高于专业体育赛事的订阅费。

康涅狄格州民主党参议员克里斯·墨菲强调了这个问题，他讲述了在一个Black Bear旗下的冰球场馆，他孩子的球队曾因未经授权的直播而面临处罚的威胁。Black Bear还收取额外费用，例如50美元的“注册和保险”费，这进一步增加了青少年体育已经飞涨的成本。现在，普通家庭每年在孩子的主要体育项目上花费超过1000美元，其中冰球平均超过2500美元，这使得低收入家庭难以承担。

其他公司，如Unrivaled Sports和贝恩资本支持的Varsity Brands（啦啦队），也采用类似的策略，整合市场，控制场馆、设备和流媒体版权。Varsity Brands甚至因涉嫌反竞争行为而面临反垄断诉讼。批评者认为，这些私募股权策略将投资者利润置于儿童发展之上，导致服务质量下降，并制造了“可负担性危机”，使青少年体育成为一项奢侈活动。

title: GitHut – Programming Languages and GitHub (2014)
summary:
GitHut, a project by Carlo Zapponi from 2014, is a visualization tool designed to explore and understand the universe of programming languages used across repositories hosted on GitHub, the world's largest code host. Its primary goal is to shed light on language popularity, unique characteristics, and the historical quest for better problem-solving and collaboration in software development.

The quantitative data for GitHut is collected quarterly from GitHub Archive, which aggregates publicly available GitHub API data and is accessible via Google BigQuery. To measure language popularity, GitHut utilizes the "Activity value," defined as the number of changes pushed to repositories. This metric was chosen because "Create Events" (new repository creations) frequently lack specified language information, making them unsuitable for tracking trending languages. The release year of programming languages is sourced from Wikipedia.

GitHut emphasizes that programming languages are not merely tools but instruments reflecting creativity and facilitating human collaboration. The project aims to provide insights into how languages are used, their evolution, and their role in the open-source community. The work is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA License.
chinese_title: GitHut — 编程语言与GitHub (2014)
chinese_summary:
GitHut 是 Carlo Zapponi 在2014年发起的一个项目，它是一个可视化工具，旨在探索和理解全球最大代码托管平台 GitHub 上各个代码仓库中使用的编程语言的“宇宙”。其主要目标是揭示语言的流行度、独特特性，以及软件开发中为实现更好的问题解决和协作而进行的历史探索。

GitHut 的定量数据每季度从 GitHub Archive 收集，GitHub Archive 聚合了公开的 GitHub API 数据，可通过 Google BigQuery 访问。为了衡量语言的流行度，GitHut 利用了“活跃度值”，该值被定义为推送到代码仓库的更改次数。选择此指标是因为“创建事件”（新代码仓库创建）通常缺乏指定的语言信息，使其不适合追踪流行语言。编程语言的发布年份则来自维基百科。

GitHut 强调，编程语言不仅仅是工具，更是反映创造力和促进人类协作的媒介。该项目旨在深入探讨语言的使用方式、演变历程以及它们在开源社区中的作用。该作品采用知识共享署名-非商业性使用-相同方式共享（CC BY-NC-SA）许可协议。

title: Arduino Terms of Service and Privacy Policy update: setting the record straight
summary:
Arduino has addressed community concerns regarding recent updates to its Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, reaffirming its unwavering 20-year commitment to open-source principles. The company explicitly states that the Qualcomm acquisition does not change user data handling or open-source practices.

Arduino clarifies that all previously open-source hardware, software, tooling, and libraries remain open. Restrictions on reverse-engineering apply specifically to their Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) cloud applications, not to open components. Users also retain ownership of content published on the Arduino platform.

The updates aim for clarity, compliance, and to support an innovative environment. Key changes include:
*   **Enhanced transparency:** More precise data practice disclosures.
*   **New product capabilities:** Reflecting the introduction of optional AI-powered features (e.g., Arduino UNO Q, Arduino App Lab).
*   **Commercial terms:** Clarifying billing, recurring payments, and refund rights for Premium Services.
*   **Legal compliance:** Addressing US privacy laws, export controls, and global standards.
*   **Minors’ data and privacy:** Strengthened protections, updated data retention policies, and age limits. Inactive accounts are deactivated after 24 months, with forum usernames preserved for content attribution unless full account deletion is requested.

Arduino encourages users to read the full documents, consult their FAQ, or contact `privacy@arduino.cc` for further questions, emphasizing their dedication to an open and collaborative community.
chinese_title: Arduino 服务条款和隐私政策更新：以正视听
chinese_summary:
Arduino已回应社区对其服务条款和隐私政策近期更新的担忧，重申其20年来对开源原则的坚定承诺。该公司明确表示，高通的收购不会改变用户数据处理或开源实践。

Arduino澄清，所有此前开源的硬件、软件、工具和库仍然保持开源。逆向工程的限制专门适用于其软件即服务（SaaS）云应用程序，而非开源组件。用户也保留其在Arduino平台发布内容的权利。

此次更新旨在提高清晰度、符合法规并支持创新环境。主要变化包括：
*   **增强透明度：** 更精确的数据实践披露。
*   **新产品功能：** 反映了可选AI驱动功能的引入（例如Arduino UNO Q、Arduino App Lab）。
*   **商业条款：** 澄清高级服务的计费、循环付款和退款权利。
*   **法律合规：** 解决美国隐私法、出口管制和全球标准问题。
*   **未成年人数据和隐私：** 加强保护、更新数据保留政策和年龄限制。不活跃账户将在24个月后停用，论坛用户名将保留用于内容归属，除非用户要求完全删除账户。

Arduino鼓励用户阅读完整文件、查阅常见问题解答或联系`privacy@arduino.cc`以获取更多问题解答，并强调其致力于建立一个开放和协作的社区。

title: OOP is shifting between domains, not disappearing
summary:
The article argues that Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) isn't disappearing but is shifting its core principle of attenuating information flow and enforcing separation between components to new domains, which the author believes is a negative development.

Historically, OOP evolved to manage complexity and enable collaboration within programs, using interfaces, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism to control how components interact. However, with the rise of distributed systems and a dissolving trust between programs and developers, the imperative for isolation moved from language-level constructs to process and network boundaries.

This shift is evident in modern paradigms like microservices, Docker, and Kubernetes. The author contends that this distributed "replacement" for OOP, despite its skepticism towards traditional OOP, replicates its flaws but magnifies them tenfold. Concepts like OpenAPI schemas, Docker Compose, and Kubernetes effectively serve as externalized versions of OOP's internal mechanisms, but with significantly increased overhead. Inter-component communication now accrues numerous failure modes, slow (de)serialization, kernel scheduling, and network latency. The author concludes that while not convinced by OOP's original promises, they are "even less convinced" by the magnified complexity and inefficiencies of the distributed systems that have taken its place.
chinese_title: OOP 正在领域间转移，并非消失。
chinese_summary:
文章认为，面向对象编程（OOP）并未消亡，而是正在将其核心原则——减少信息流和强制组件间分离——转移到新的领域，作者认为这是一个负面发展。

历史上，OOP的发展是为了管理程序内部的复杂性并促进协作，利用接口、封装、继承和多态来控制组件如何交互。然而，随着分布式系统的兴起以及程序与开发者之间信任的瓦解，隔离的需求从语言层面的结构转向了进程和网络边界。

这种转变在微服务、Docker和Kubernetes等现代范式中显而易见。作者认为，这种分布式对OOP的“替代”，尽管对传统OOP持怀疑态度，却复制了其缺陷，并将其放大了十倍。OpenAPI规范、Docker Compose和Kubernetes等概念实质上是OOP内部机制的外部化版本，但伴随着显著增加的开销。组件间通信现在带来了众多故障模式、缓慢的（反）序列化、内核调度和网络延迟。作者总结道，尽管他们不相信OOP最初的承诺，但对于那些取代OOP的分布式系统所带来的被放大的复杂性和低效率，他们“更难信服”。

title: The death of tech idealism and rise of the homeless in Northern California
summary:
The article "On the Death of Tech Idealism (and Rise of the Homeless) in Northern California" chronicles the sharp decline of Silicon Valley's utopian vision and the concurrent surge in homelessness. The author recounts visiting a former client, a venture capitalist, who has evolved from a charming progressive to a cynical libertarian, spewing expletives and dismissing efforts to address homelessness as inefficient and idealistic. This VC believes "innovators" could solve the problem if not for "incompetent" public sector and non-profits, asserting that only the profit motive drives solutions.

The author, who fled California's high housing costs twelve years prior, returns to find real estate prices tripled and homelessness rampant, even in his former home of Santa Cruz. He contrasts the VC's current disdain with the Valley's historical roots in countercultural idealism. Early tech pioneers like Steve Jobs and Stewart Brand (of the Whole Earth Catalog) blended hippie values with technology, envisioning computers as tools for personal liberation and community-building, a "New Communalist dream."

However, this idealism, often masking individualism, has morphed. Figures like Brand now build elaborate projects for tech titans like Jeff Bezos, reflecting a shift to intellectual hubris. The Valley, once the "Valley of Heart's Delight" carpeted with orchards, became a tech hub founded on the military-industrial complex, with defense industry "DNA" embedded in today's giants. The article highlights the grim irony of tech's utopian claims against the backdrop of escalating inequality, environmental degradation (the "ass cloud" from the bay), and the bulldozing of homeless camps in the shadows of corporate campuses.
chinese_title: 科技理想主义的破灭与北加州无家可归者的崛起
chinese_summary:
文章《北加州科技理想主义之死（以及无家可归者之增多）》记载了硅谷乌托邦愿景的急剧衰落以及伴随而来的无家可归者数量的激增。作者讲述了他拜访一位前客户，一位风险投资家，此人已从一个富有魅力的进步主义者演变为一个愤世嫉俗的自由意志主义者，满口粗话，并将解决无家可归问题的努力斥为低效和不切实际的理想主义。这位风投认为，“创新者”本能够解决问题，如果不是因为“无能的”公共部门和非营利组织，他坚称只有利润动机才能驱动解决方案。

作者十二年前因加州高昂的住房成本而逃离，他重返故地，发现房地产价格翻了三倍，无家可归现象猖獗，甚至在他曾经的家园圣克鲁斯也是如此。他将这位风投目前的蔑视与硅谷根植于反主流文化理想主义的历史根源进行对比。早期的科技先驱，如史蒂夫·乔布斯和斯图尔特·布兰德（《全球概览》的创始人），将嬉皮士价值观与技术融合，设想计算机是实现个人解放和社区建设的工具，一种“新公社主义梦想”。

然而，这种理想主义，往往掩盖着个人主义，已经变质。像布兰德这样的人物现在为杰夫·贝佐斯等科技巨头打造精心设计的项目，这反映出向智力傲慢的转变。硅谷，这个曾经遍布果园的“心悦谷”，变成了建立在军事工业复合体基础上的科技中心，国防工业的“DNA”根植于当今的巨头企业之中。文章强调了科技乌托邦主张的残酷讽刺，其背景是不平等日益加剧、环境恶化（海湾上空那片“屁云”），以及在企业园区阴影下对无家可归者营地的推土机式拆除。

title: The Untold History of Arduino (2016)
summary:
Hernando Barragán wrote this article to clarify the history of Wiring and Arduino, aiming to correct misinformation and provide documented facts. He created Wiring in 2003 as his Master's thesis at the Interaction Design Institute Ivrea (IDII), supervised by Massimo Banzi and Casey Reas. Its objective was to simplify electronics for artists and designers, abstracting complexities so they could focus on their projects.

Wiring introduced key elements: a simple IDE based on Processing, a user-friendly programming language for microcontrollers (with commands like `pinMode()`, `digitalWrite()`), open-source software, and hardware designs based on Atmel microcontrollers. Barragán detailed the design process, including hardware prototypes—from the Javelin Stamp to Atmel ATmega128, incorporating Brian Dean's "avrdude" and FTDI for USB communication. The first Wiring board design emerged in early 2004, with 25 boards hand-soldered and tested.

Wiring gained significant traction, especially with the "Strangely Familiar" project at IDII in late 2004, and by 2005, it was being used globally.

In 2005, Massimo Banzi, David Mellis, and David Cuartielles forked (copied) Wiring's source code to create Arduino, adding support for the cheaper ATmega8 microcontroller. Barragán states he was never asked to join the Arduino team, finding the fork puzzling as he had planned to integrate such developments. Gianluca Martino later joined Arduino for manufacturing. Despite the separation, Barragán continued Wiring's development, and many improvements from Wiring were subsequently merged into the Arduino codebase, a situation Barragán found redundant. He later co-authored a book chapter that referenced both Wiring and Arduino.
chinese_title: 阿尔杜伊诺不为人知的历史 (2016)
chinese_summary:
赫尔南多·巴拉甘撰写本文，旨在澄清Wiring和Arduino的历史，纠正错误信息并提供有据可查的事实。他于2003年在伊夫雷亚交互设计学院（IDII）创作了Wiring作为其硕士论文，导师是马西莫·班齐和凯西·里亚斯。其目的是为艺术家和设计师简化电子学，抽象化复杂性，使他们能专注于自己的项目。

Wiring引入了关键要素：一个基于Processing的简单集成开发环境（IDE），一种用于微控制器的用户友好型编程语言（包含`pinMode()`、`digitalWrite()`等命令），开源软件，以及基于Atmel微控制器的硬件设计。巴拉甘详细介绍了设计过程，包括硬件原型——从Javelin Stamp到Atmel ATmega128，其中整合了布赖恩·迪恩的"avrdude"和FTDI用于USB通信。首个Wiring板设计于2004年初问世，有25块板子经过手工焊接和测试。

Wiring获得了显著关注，特别是在2004年末IDII的"Strangely Familiar"项目之后；到2005年，它已在全球范围内使用。

2005年，马西莫·班齐、大卫·梅利斯和大卫·夸蒂列斯分叉（复制）了Wiring的源代码以创建Arduino，并增加了对更便宜的ATmega8微控制器的支持。巴拉甘表示他从未被邀请加入Arduino团队，他觉得这次分叉令人费解，因为他原本计划整合此类开发。吉安卢卡·马蒂诺后来加入Arduino负责制造。尽管分道扬镳，巴拉甘继续了Wiring的开发，而Wiring的许多改进后来被合并到Arduino的代码库中，巴拉甘认为这种情况是多余的。他后来合著了一本书的章节，其中引用了Wiring和Arduino。

title: The senior population is booming. Caregiving is struggling to keep up
summary:
The U.S. senior population is booming, with those aged 65 and older increasing from 12.4% in 2004 to 18% in 2024. This surge, largely due to aging baby boomers, has created unprecedented demand for senior care, which the labor force is struggling to meet. Personal experiences, like Beth Pinsker's, highlight a trend of skyrocketing prices and declining service quality.

Data confirms this crisis: senior care prices are rising faster than inflation (over 4% annually), and Harvard Public Health projects 4.6 million unfulfilled home care jobs by 2032. The long-term care sector faces a labor gap more severe than any other healthcare segment.

Experts attribute this "critical labor shortage" to low wages, poor job quality, and limited career advancement. Home health aides earn only marginally more per hour ($16.82) than fast-food workers ($15.07), despite demanding more training and strenuous work. This understaffing results in compromised resident care, such as long waits for basic needs and a severe lack of medical professionals in facilities.

Proposed solutions include increasing wages, allowing more immigration to fill jobs, and establishing clearer career ladders and affordable training programs. Companies like Care.com are expanding services to meet the growing, often sudden, demand for senior care, recognizing it as their fastest-growing segment. The crisis disproportionately affects the "sandwich generation" and poses a significant drag on economic growth, underscoring an urgent, often unseen, societal challenge.
chinese_title: 老年人口激增，养老服务难以跟上。
chinese_summary:
美国老年人口正在激增，65岁及以上人口比例从2004年的12.4%增至2024年的18%。这一激增主要归因于“婴儿潮”一代的老龄化，对老年护理产生了前所未有的需求，而劳动力市场正努力应对这种需求。贝丝·平斯克（Beth Pinsker）等人的亲身经历凸显了价格飞涨和服务质量下降的趋势。

数据证实了这场危机：老年护理价格的上涨速度快于通货膨胀（年均超过4%），哈佛公共卫生学院预计到2032年将有460万个家庭护理职位空缺。长期护理行业面临的劳动力缺口比任何其他医疗保健领域都更为严重。

专家将这种“关键劳动力短缺”归因于低工资、恶劣的工作条件和有限的职业发展机会。尽管家庭健康助理需要更多培训和繁重工作，但他们的时薪（16.82美元）仅比快餐店员工（15.07美元）略高。人手不足导致居民护理质量受损，例如基本需求等待时间过长以及机构中严重缺乏医护专业人员。

拟议的解决方案包括提高工资、允许更多移民填补职位空缺、建立更清晰的职业晋升阶梯和提供负担得起的培训项目。像Care.com这样的公司正在扩大服务范围，以满足日益增长且往往突发的老年护理需求，并将其视为增长最快的业务板块。这场危机不成比例地影响着“夹心一代”，并对经济增长构成巨大阻碍，凸显了一个紧迫且往往不为人知的社会挑战。

title: CDC to end all monkey research; will phase out HIV, infectious disease studies
summary:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is discontinuing virtually all research involving nonhuman primates, a decision that will phase out decades-long studies on HIV and other infectious diseases at its Atlanta campus. This significant policy shift follows years of internal review and pressure from animal welfare groups, including PETA.

The CDC confirmed it will launch no new monkey studies, and existing projects involving its fewer than 100 macaques and other primates will be phased out. These animals will either be transferred to sanctuaries or retired from research. A CDC spokesperson indicated the move reflects the agency's "commitment to the ethical treatment of animals" and acknowledges progress in alternative research methods, such as in vitro and computational models.

While the National Institutes of Health (NIH) ended most of its chimpanzee research in 2015, it continues significant monkey research. The CDC's decision has been lauded by animal rights advocates but has raised concerns among some scientists about its potential impact on understanding complex infectious diseases and vaccine development, areas where animal models are still considered crucial by a segment of the research community.
chinese_title: 疾控中心将终止所有猴类研究；逐步取消艾滋病和传染病研究
chinese_summary:
疾病控制与预防中心（CDC）将停止几乎所有涉及非人灵长类动物的研究，这一决定将逐步淘汰其亚特兰大校区数十年来进行的关于艾滋病及其他传染病的长期研究。这一重大的政策转变是在多年内部审查以及包括善待动物组织（PETA）在内的动物福利团体的压力之后做出的。

CDC证实将不再开展新的猴子研究，而现有涉及其不足100只猕猴及其他灵长类动物的项目也将逐步停止。这些动物将被转移到动物收容所，或从研究中“退役”。一位CDC发言人表示，此举反映了该机构“对动物伦理对待的承诺”，并承认替代研究方法（例如体外和计算模型）的进展。

尽管美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）已于2015年结束了大部分黑猩猩研究，但仍在继续进行大量的猴子研究。CDC的这一决定受到了动物权利倡导者的赞扬，但也引起了一些科学家的担忧，担心其可能对理解复杂的传染病和疫苗开发产生影响，而在这些领域，动物模型仍被部分研究界认为至关重要。

title: Building a Minimal Viable Armv7 Emulator from Scratch
summary:
This article details the creation of "stinkarm," a minimal viable Armv7 userspace emulator built from scratch in 1.3k lines of Rust with zero dependencies. The author's motivation stems from a desire to deeply understand the ELF format, Arm 32-bit instruction encoding, and execution flow, which will inform the JIT for a custom programming language.

`stinkarm` can parse and validate 32-bit Arm ELF binaries, map their segments, decode a subset of Arm instructions, translate guest and host memory interactions, and forward Arm Linux syscalls to x86-64 System V equivalents. It successfully executes a basic Armv7 "hello world" binary in 1.9ms (0.015ms raw emulation), a significant improvement over QEMU's 12.3ms for the same task, though still 100-1000x slower than native execution.

The development process is outlined, starting with crafting a minimal Arm assembly "exit" syscall. A Rust build script (`bld_exmpl`) and Nix flake are used to cross-compile Arm assembly into an Armv7 ELF binary on an x86 system. A core focus is on ELF parsing, specifically the `Elf32_Ehdr` (ELF header) and `Elf32_Phdr` (program headers). The `Ehdr` is rigorously validated for Armv7, 32-bit, little-endian architecture, and static executable type using Rust's `TryFrom` trait and custom little-endian byte-to-integer macros (`le16!`, `le32!`). The `Phdr` is then used to extract critical segment information for memory mapping.
chinese_title: 从零构建最小可行Armv7模拟器
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了 "stinkarm" 的创建，这是一个用 1.3k 行 Rust 代码、零依赖、从零开始构建的最小可行 Armv7 用户空间模拟器。作者的动机源于希望深入理解 ELF 格式、Arm 32 位指令编码和执行流程，这将为一种自定义编程语言的 JIT 编译器提供参考。

`stinkarm` 能够解析并验证 32 位 Arm ELF 二进制文件，映射其段，解码一部分 Arm 指令，转换访客和主机内存交互，并将 Arm Linux 系统调用转发到 x86-64 System V 对应的实现。它成功地在 1.9 毫秒内（其中原始模拟仅需 0.015 毫秒）执行了一个基本的 Armv7 "hello world" 二进制文件，与 QEMU 完成相同任务所需的 12.3 毫秒相比，这是一个显著的提升，尽管仍比原生执行慢 100-1000 倍。

文章概述了开发过程，首先从编写一个最小的 Arm 汇编 "exit" 系统调用开始。使用 Rust 构建脚本 (`bld_exmpl`) 和 Nix flake 在 x86 系统上将 Arm 汇编代码交叉编译成一个 Armv7 ELF 二进制文件。核心关注点是 ELF 解析，特别是 `Elf32_Ehdr` (ELF 头) 和 `Elf32_Phdr` (程序头)。`Ehdr` 被严格验证其是否为 Armv7、32 位、小端架构和静态可执行文件类型，这通过使用 Rust 的 `TryFrom` trait 和自定义的小端字节到整数宏 (`le16!`, `le32!`) 来实现。随后，`Phdr` 被用于提取关键的段信息，以便进行内存映射。

title: A time-travelling door bug in Half Life 2
summary: The article highlights a discussion initiated by Tom Forsyth on Gamedev Mastodon concerning "the perils of doors in games." Specifically, the topic revolves around a unique "time-travelling door bug" encountered in Half-Life 2. This suggests that interactive doors can present complex and sometimes unusual technical challenges for game developers. The accompanying Chinese text is a technical note about needing JavaScript to use the Mastodon web application and is not part of the game development discussion itself.
chinese_title: 半衰期2的时空穿梭门bug
chinese_summary: 文章重点介绍Tom Forsyth在Gamedev Mastodon上发起的一场关于“游戏中门的危险”的讨论。具体来说，该话题围绕着《半条命2》中遇到的一个独特的“时间旅行门bug”。这表明交互式门可能会给游戏开发者带来复杂且有时不寻常的技术挑战。附带的中文文本是一条关于使用Mastodon网络应用程序需要JavaScript的技术说明，不属于游戏开发讨论本身。

title: Brazil charges 31 people in major carbon credit fraud investigation
summary:
Brazil's Federal Police have indicted 31 people for fraud and land-grabbing in the largest known carbon credit fraud investigation in the nation's history, dubbed "Operation Greenwashing." The scheme, based in the Brazilian Amazon, involved two REDD+ carbon credit projects, Unitor and Fortaleza Ituxi, covering over 140,000 hectares in Lábrea, Amazonas state.

The investigation, prompted by a Mongabay report and analysis by the Center for Climate Crime Analysis, confirmed that these projects were simultaneously generating carbon credits while also being used to launder illegal timber from other deforested areas.

Three interconnected groups were involved. One was led by Ricardo Stoppe Júnior, Brazil's largest individual carbon credit seller, who sold millions in credits to corporations like Nestlé, Spotify, and Boeing. The other groups were led by Élcio Aparecido Moço and José Luiz Capelasso, both with prior convictions related to illegal timber or forest product certificates. The fraud was facilitated by corrupt public servants in Brazil’s land reform agency (Incra), registrar offices, and the Amazonas state environmental protection institute (Ipaam). Both Incra and Ipaam have stated their support for the police investigation.
chinese_title: 巴西就重大碳信用欺诈案起诉31人。
chinese_summary:
巴西联邦警察在该国历史上已知最大规模的碳信用欺诈调查（代号“洗绿行动”）中，起诉了31名涉嫌欺诈和非法侵占土地的人。该骗局以巴西亚马逊地区为基地，涉及Unitor和Fortaleza Ituxi两个REDD+碳信用项目，这两个项目覆盖亚马逊州拉布雷亚市超过14万公顷的土地。

这项调查由Mongabay的一份报告和气候犯罪分析中心（Center for Climate Crime Analysis）的分析促成，证实这些项目在同时生成碳信用的同时，也被用于洗白来自其他被砍伐区域的非法木材。

有三个相互关联的团伙涉案。其中一个由巴西最大的个人碳信用卖家里卡多·斯托佩·儒尼奥尔（Ricardo Stoppe Júnior）领导，他曾向雀巢（Nestlé）、Spotify和波音（Boeing）等公司出售了数百万碳信用额。另两个团伙则由埃尔西奥·阿帕雷西多·莫索（Élcio Aparecido Moço）和若泽·路易斯·卡佩拉索（José Luiz Capelasso）领导，两人都有与非法木材或林产品证书相关的前科。这起欺诈案由巴西土地改革机构（Incra）、登记处和亚马逊州环境保护研究所（Ipaam）的腐败公职人员提供便利。Incra和Ipaam都已表示支持警方调查。

title: Virgin and Qantas to ban use of portable power banks after string of fires
summary:
Australian airlines Virgin Australia, Qantas, QantasLink, and Jetstar are implementing new bans on the use and charging of portable power banks during flights, effective December 1 for Virgin Australia and December 15 for the Qantas group. This decision follows a string of international and domestic incidents involving lithium battery fires, including a mid-air fire on a Virgin Australia flight in July.

Under the new regulations, passengers are prohibited from using or charging power banks on board, although in-seat charging for other devices remains permitted. Passengers will be limited to carrying two power banks in their cabin baggage. Virgin Australia will require airline approval for units between 100-160 watt-hours (Wh) and prohibit those over 160 Wh, while Qantas and Jetstar will cap individual units at 160 Wh. All power banks are strictly forbidden in checked-in luggage and must be kept easily accessible in cabin baggage, not stowed in overhead lockers (especially for Virgin Australia).

These changes align Australian carriers with international safety standards, as global airlines like Emirates and Cathay Pacific have already banned power bank use. The Australian Transport Safety Bureau (ATSB) has recorded five in-flight power bank fires on Australian aircraft since 2016. Both the Flight Attendants Association of Australia (FAAA) and the Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC), which reported a 92% jump in lithium battery incidents between 2020-2022, have highlighted the significant risks posed by these devices, particularly defective ones.
chinese_title: 维珍航空与澳洲航空将在多起火灾后禁用充电宝
chinese_summary:
澳大利亚航空公司维珍澳大利亚航空、澳洲航空、澳航快运和捷星航空正在实施新的规定，禁止乘客在航班上使用和为移动电源充电。该规定对维珍澳大利亚航空于12月1日生效，对澳航集团则于12月15日生效。这一决定是在发生一系列涉及锂电池火灾的国际和国内事件之后做出的，其中包括7月维珍澳大利亚航空一架航班上发生的空中火灾。

根据新规定，乘客被禁止在机上使用或为移动电源充电，但其他设备的座位充电仍被允许。每位乘客随身行李中最多可携带两个移动电源。维珍澳大利亚航空要求容量介于100-160瓦时（Wh）的移动电源需经航空公司批准，并禁止携带容量超过160瓦时的设备；而澳洲航空和捷星航空则将单个设备的容量上限设为160瓦时。所有移动电源均严禁托运，必须随身携带并易于取用，不得存放在头顶行李舱中（维珍澳大利亚航空尤其如此）。

这些改变使澳大利亚航空公司符合国际安全标准，因为阿联酋航空和国泰航空等全球航空公司已经禁止使用移动电源。自2016年以来，澳大利亚运输安全局（ATSB）已记录了五起移动电源在澳大利亚飞机上起火的事件。澳大利亚空乘人员协会（FAAA）和澳大利亚竞争和消费者委员会（ACCC）（后者报告称2020年至2022年间锂电池事故增加了92%）均强调了这些设备，特别是存在缺陷的设备，所带来的重大风险。

title: Command Lines
summary:
The article "Command Lines" argues that AI coding assistants are ushering in a paradigm shift in software development, similar to how compilers freed programmers from machine code. This rapidly growing market, featuring startups like Cursor achieving record revenues and giants like Google and AWS launching new tools, allows engineers to focus on higher-level logic by generating code from natural language.

The author categorizes users into three types: "Handcrafted Coding" (engineers avoiding AI), "Vibe Coding" (non-engineers prototyping concepts with minimal review), and "Architect + AI Coding" (engineers using AI as a pair programmer for routine tasks while maintaining control). These user types lead to two market splits: "Hands-off" tools for non-engineers building prototypes, and "Hands-on" tools for professional engineers integrating AI into production workflows, the latter being the larger segment.

A critical factor in this competition is model quality, which the author deems decisive. While some companies develop in-house models, reliance on frontier models from OpenAI and Anthropic is still prevalent. Incumbents like Microsoft's GitHub Copilot leverage bundling and distribution to maintain market leadership, challenging newcomers. Ultimately, AI tools are freeing developers from boilerplate code, paving the way for autonomous software generation. Success will depend on delivering superior model quality, shipping reliable code, offering deep features, and achieving user stickiness.
chinese_title: 命令行
chinese_summary:
文章《命令行》认为，AI编程助手正在引领软件开发领域的范式转变，类似于编译器将程序员从机器代码中解放出来的方式。这一快速增长的市场，其中Cursor等初创公司实现了创纪录的收入，谷歌、AWS等巨头也纷纷推出新工具，它允许工程师通过自然语言生成代码，从而专注于更高级别的逻辑。

作者将用户分为三类：“手工编程”（工程师避免使用AI）、“随性编程”（非工程师以最少审查来构建概念原型），以及“架构师+AI编程”（工程师使用AI作为结对程序员来处理日常任务，同时保持控制）。这些用户类型导致了两种市场划分：“不插手”工具，面向非工程师构建原型；以及“亲力亲为”工具，面向将AI集成到生产工作流中的专业工程师，后者是更大的市场部分。

这场竞争中的一个关键因素是模型质量，作者认为这是决定性的。尽管有些公司开发内部模型，但对OpenAI和Anthropic等公司前沿模型的依赖仍然普遍存在。微软的GitHub Copilot等现有企业利用捆绑销售和分发来保持市场领先地位，对新进入者构成挑战。最终，AI工具正在将开发者从样板代码中解放出来，为自主软件生成铺平道路。成功将取决于提供卓越的模型质量、交付可靠的代码、提供深度功能以及实现用户粘性。

title: My private information is worth $30
summary:
The author expresses profound anger and disappointment regarding a $30 compensation offer from the University of Minnesota for a 2021 data breach. As an alumnus, their personal information, including sensitive data like Social Security numbers, was exposed. The university settled a class action lawsuit for $5 million without admitting wrongdoing, offering affected individuals $30 along with two years of identity theft protection services.

The author finds this amount "insulting" and a "slap in the face," particularly given the university's frequent requests for donations and its failure to honor previous commitments like lifetime email access. They criticize the university for prioritizing its reputation and financial bottom line over accountability, a formal apology, and the trust of affected individuals.

This behavior, according to the author, is not unique to the University of Minnesota but reflects a systemic issue where institutions, both public and commercial, avoid genuine responsibility for data breaches due to weak regulations and insufficient legal penalties. The author argues that current fines and settlements are too low to incentivize better data security.

Refusing the $30 settlement, the author advocates for stronger regulations and harsher penalties to hold institutions accountable for data breaches. They believe increased financial consequences would force universities to invest more in protecting personal information rather than continuing to allocate vast sums to administrative costs and executive salaries.
chinese_title: 我的个人信息值30美元
chinese_summary:
作者对明尼苏达大学就2021年数据泄露事件提出的30美元赔偿金深感愤怒和失望。作为校友，他们的个人信息，包括社会安全号码等敏感数据，遭到泄露。该大学以500万美元和解了一项集体诉讼，但未承认任何不当行为，仅向受影响的个人提供30美元以及两年身份盗窃保护服务。

作者认为，这笔赔偿金额“具有侮辱性”，简直是“一记耳光”，尤其考虑到大学频繁要求捐款，却未能兑现之前诸如终身邮件访问权限等承诺。他们批评大学将声誉和财务底线置于问责制、正式道歉以及受影响个人的信任之上。

作者指出，这种行为并非明尼苏达大学独有，而是反映了一个系统性问题：由于监管不力和法律惩罚不足，无论是公共机构还是商业机构，都逃避对数据泄露的真正责任。作者认为，当前的罚款和和解金过低，无法激励机构改进数据安全措施。

作者拒绝了这笔30美元的和解金，并呼吁制定更严格的法规和更严厉的惩罚，以追究机构在数据泄露方面的责任。他们相信，增加经济后果将迫使大学投入更多资金保护个人信息，而非继续将巨额资金分配给行政开支和高管薪资。

title: Apple's Problem with Bodies
summary:
Apple's App Store struggles with classifying apps related to personal intimacy and body-related wellbeing, a problem stemming from its foundational design. The author illustrates this through their app, "Silk," a private, on-device intimacy journal. Despite being a benign wellbeing tool, Silk was assigned a 16+ rating—typically for gambling or "unrestricted web access"—highlighting a "grey zone" for which no appropriate category exists.

This issue originates from the App Store's early days, where its vocabulary derived from iTunes and film ratings, built for visual "content" rather than user-generated personal data. While the current iOS 26 rating matrix is forensically precise for violence or medical risk, it defines everything by "content" within the app bundle, not the user's context. This leads to misclassification of apps like Silk, which has no objectionable content but is flagged due to keywords that hint at "mature themes."

The lack of a specific category for relational wellbeing impacts search discoverability and forces developers to navigate a "metadata minefield," as terms like "intimacy tracker" trigger stricter reviews. Even Apple HealthKit, despite expanding, avoids modeling intimacy. The system's "conservatism," driven by past incidents and liability concerns, leads it to err on caution when encountering undefined cases.

The author's strategy is to treat the App Store as a black box, experimenting with metadata and screenshots to infer its rules. While new categories like sleep and cycle tracking eventually emerge, the process is slow. Developers must build within the platform's current "language," operating in this grey zone until Apple's taxonomy evolves to catch up with user needs.
chinese_title: 苹果的人体问题
chinese_summary:
苹果的App Store在对与个人亲密关系和身体健康相关的应用进行分类时遇到困难，这是一个源于其基础设计的问题。作者通过他们的应用“Silk”（一款私密的、运行于设备上的亲密关系日记）来说明这一点。尽管“Silk”是一款良性的健康工具，却被评定为16+，这个评级通常适用于赌博或“不受限制的网络访问”应用，这突出表明了一个“灰色地带”，目前没有合适的类别。

这个问题源于App Store的早期，其词汇体系来源于iTunes和电影评级，专为视觉“内容”而非用户生成的个人数据而设计。尽管当前的iOS 26评级矩阵对于暴力或医疗风险的界定极其精确，但它通过应用包内的“内容”而非用户的上下文来定义一切。这导致了像“Silk”这类应用的错误分类，它本身没有令人反感的内容，但因暗示“成人主题”的关键词而被标记。

缺乏针对关系健康的特定类别，影响了应用的搜索可见性，并迫使开发者们在“元数据雷区”中摸索，因为“亲密追踪器”之类的词语会触发更严格的审查。即使是不断扩展的Apple HealthKit，也避免对亲密关系进行建模。该系统由过去的事件和责任担忧驱动的“保守主义”，使其在遇到未定义情况时倾向于过度谨慎。

作者的策略是将App Store视为一个黑盒子，通过试验元数据和屏幕截图来推断其规则。尽管睡眠和经期追踪等新类别最终会出现，但这个过程很缓慢。开发者必须在平台当前的“语言”范围内进行开发，在这个灰色地带中运营，直到苹果的分类体系发展到能够满足用户需求。

title: Our babies were taken after 'biased' parenting test
summary:
The article details the distressing experiences of Greenlandic families in Denmark whose children have been removed following "biased" parental competency tests (FKUs). These tests, now banned for Greenlandic families but still used for others, are heavily criticised for cultural bias, being administered in Danish, and lacking scientific validity for predicting parenting ability.

Keira's daughter Zammi was taken just two hours after birth, based on a test that deemed her unfit. She highlights culturally specific questions and alleges a psychologist told her to "act like a human being." Similarly, Johanne and Ulrik's son was adopted after Johanne's test labelled her "narcissistic" and "mentally retarded," and she claims being called a "barbarian" for a Rorschach test answer. The Danish government refuses to review adoption cases, citing children are settled.

Greenlandic parents are 5.6 times more likely to have children removed. While the government promised to review approximately 300 cases, only 10 have been assessed, with no children returned. Families like Keira's continue their fight for reunification, feeling profound heartbreak and cultural alienation, while Pilinguaq's recent reunification with her daughter offers a rare glimpse of hope.
chinese_title: 我们的宝宝在“偏颇”的亲职测试后被夺走
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了格陵兰家庭在丹麦的痛苦经历，他们的孩子在“带有偏见的”父母能力测试（FKU）后被带走。这些测试现在已被禁止用于格陵兰家庭，但仍用于其他家庭，因其文化偏见、用丹麦语进行以及在预测育儿能力方面缺乏科学有效性而受到严厉批评。

凯拉的女儿扎米在出生仅两小时后就被带走，原因是她的测试结果被认定为不适合抚养孩子。她指出测试中存在文化特定问题，并声称一位心理医生告诉她“表现得像个人样”。同样，约翰娜和乌尔里克在约翰娜的测试被贴上“自恋”和“智力迟钝”的标签后，他们的儿子被收养了。她还声称在罗夏测试的一个答案后被称作“野蛮人”。丹麦政府拒绝审查收养案件，理由是孩子们已经安定下来。

格陵兰父母的孩子被带走的可能性是其他父母的5.6倍。尽管政府承诺审查约300个案件，但目前仅评估了10个，并且没有孩子被送回。像凯拉这样的家庭继续为骨肉团聚而奋斗，感受着深深的心痛和文化异化。而皮林瓜最近与女儿的团聚则带来了一线罕见的希望。

title: The Qtile Window Manager: A Python-Powered Tiling Experience
summary:
This article details the author's journey from XFCE to Qtile, a Python-powered tiling window manager, driven by a desire for a more productive Linux environment. Frustrated with previous attempts at i3wm and xmonad, Qtile's Python configurability proved enticing.

The author emphasizes an isolated installation approach, using virtual environments via the `deadsnakes` PPA, and manually setting up a `.desktop` entry. A key philosophy is modularizing the Python configuration, separating variable declarations for better maintainability and error handling.

Their refined Qtile setup boasts a consistent color scheme and custom assets. Noteworthy features include a "smart mouse movement" function for seamless multi-monitor navigation (Super + .), logical Vim-style keybindings, and powerful hardware-aware widgets. These widgets dynamically display battery status (only on laptops), current IP address, and real-time AMD GPU VRAM usage integrated with `amdgpu_top`. The configuration also dynamically adapts to the number of connected monitors and utilizes startup hooks for initial and recurring scripts.

Lessons learned highlight the immense power of Python for complex logic and integration, the importance of starting simple and iterating, the necessity of hardware awareness, and performance considerations for custom widgets. Future plans include developing more custom widgets (e.g., One Piece chapter notifications, Kubernetes context) and enhanced multi-monitor support. Qtile has significantly transformed the author's Linux desktop experience and productivity.
chinese_title: Qtile 窗口管理器：基于 Python 的平铺体验
chinese_summary:
本文详细讲述了作者为了寻求更高效的Linux环境，从XFCE转向Qtile（一个由Python驱动的平铺式窗口管理器）的历程。在对i3wm和xmonad的先前尝试感到失望之后，Qtile基于Python的可配置性使其极具吸引力。

作者强调了一种隔离的安装方法，即通过`deadsnakes` PPA利用虚拟环境，并手动设置`.desktop`入口。一个核心理念是对Python配置进行模块化，分离变量声明，以提高可维护性和错误处理能力。

作者精炼后的Qtile配置具备一致的配色方案和自定义资源。值得注意的特性包括一个用于无缝多显示器导航的“智能鼠标移动”功能（Super + .）、逻辑Vim风格的键位绑定，以及强大的硬件感知小部件。这些小部件动态显示电池状态（仅限笔记本电脑）、当前IP地址，以及与`amdgpu_top`集成的实时AMD GPU VRAM使用情况。该配置还动态适应连接显示器的数量，并利用启动钩子来运行初始和周期性脚本。

所汲取的经验教训强调了Python在复杂逻辑和集成方面的巨大能力、从简单开始并迭代的重要性、硬件感知的必要性以及自定义小部件的性能考量。未来的计划包括开发更多自定义小部件（例如《海贼王》章节通知、Kubernetes上下文）和增强的多显示器支持。Qtile显著改变了作者的Linux桌面体验和生产力。

title: 3D printing with unconventional vase mode
summary:
This article details advanced 3D printing techniques for "unconventional vase mode," aimed at experienced users to save print time and material. Vase mode typically prints a single-perimeter spiral path without seams, but lacks internal geometry, infill, or top layers.

The first trick involves creating extremely thin "slits" (e.g., 0.0001 mm) within the model. The slicer interprets these as external perimeters dipping inward, forming internal support. Crucially, PrusaSlicer's "Slice gap closing radius" must be set to 0.0 to prevent these slits from merging.

Building on this, "double walls" allow for stronger sections or securely anchoring internal slits to the outer wall. The width of these double walls must precisely match the slicer's calculated perimeter width for the current settings. Additionally, increasing "extrusion width" (up to 2x nozzle diameter) can further strengthen vase mode prints.

The author also introduces "fake vase mode," where users manually configure slicer settings—like a single perimeter, no top layers or infill, and disabling "ensure vertical shell thickness"—to mimic vase mode's benefits without the continuous spiral path. This offers greater flexibility, allowing for features like printable top surfaces or specific internal geometry, as demonstrated in a case study of printed spheres. The author concludes that while slits can be visible, "fake vase mode" combined with "scarf seams" often yields better aesthetic and functional results, providing most of the benefits of true vase mode without its limitations.
chinese_title: 非常规花瓶模式3D打印
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了“非常规花瓶模式”的先进3D打印技术，旨在帮助经验丰富的用户节省打印时间和材料。花瓶模式通常打印单层螺旋路径，没有接缝，但缺少内部几何结构、填充或顶层。

第一个技巧是在模型内部创建极薄的“狭缝”（例如0.0001毫米）。切片软件将其解释为向内凹陷的外周边，从而形成内部支撑。关键是，PrusaSlicer的“切片间隙闭合半径”必须设置为0.0，以防止这些狭缝合并。

在此基础上，“双壁”可以实现更坚固的区域，或将内部狭缝牢固地锚定到外壁。这些双壁的宽度必须与切片软件根据当前设置计算出的周边宽度精确匹配。此外，增加“挤出宽度”（可达喷嘴直径的2倍）可以进一步加强花瓶模式打印件。

作者还介绍了“伪花瓶模式”，用户手动配置切片软件设置——例如单层周边、无顶层或填充，并禁用“确保垂直外壳厚度”——以模拟花瓶模式的优点，但没有连续的螺旋路径。这提供了更大的灵活性，允许实现可打印的顶面或特定的内部几何结构，正如打印球体案例研究中所示。作者总结道，虽然狭缝可能可见，“伪花瓶模式”结合“围巾接缝”通常能产生更好的美学和功能效果，提供了真实花瓶模式的大部分优点而没有其局限性。

title: RI judge intervenes after ICE mistakenly detains Superior Court intern
summary:
A Rhode Island Superior Court intern, Luis Angel Reyes, 21, was mistakenly detained by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) while en route to a court hearing where a minor domestic violence charge against him was expected to be dismissed. Reyes, a recipient of Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA), was pulled over for a broken taillight when an old ICE warrant, stemming from the 2017 domestic violence charge for which he was never convicted, appeared. He was detained for about 24 hours.

Superior Court Presiding Justice Alice Gibney swiftly intervened, contacting the U.S. Attorney’s office and ICE directly. She clarified Reyes's role as her intern and his scheduled court appearance. The domestic violence charge was indeed dismissed as anticipated.

The incident has highlighted concerns regarding federal immigration enforcement policies, particularly how they affect DACA recipients and the smooth operation of the justice system. Reyes's legal team from the Roger Williams University School of Law Immigration Clinic is now working to permanently remove the ICE detainer. Judge Gibney underscored the valuable contributions of DACA recipients like Reyes to the community, emphasizing the broader implications of such mistaken detentions. Reyes has since been released.
chinese_title: 移民局误拘高等法院实习生，罗德岛法官介入
chinese_summary:
罗德岛州高等法院实习生路易斯·安赫尔·雷耶斯（Luis Angel Reyes，21岁）在前往法院出庭的途中，被美国移民和海关执法局（ICE）错误拘留。此前，预计针对他的一项轻微家庭暴力指控将在庭上被撤销。雷耶斯是“童年入境者暂缓遣返”计划（DACA）的受益人。他因车尾灯损坏被拦下，此时一张源于2017年家庭暴力指控（他从未因此被定罪）的旧ICE逮捕令浮现。他被拘留了大约24小时。

高等法院首席法官爱丽丝·吉布尼（Alice Gibney）迅速介入，直接联系了美国联邦检察官办公室和ICE。她澄清了雷耶斯作为她的实习生身份及其预定的出庭安排。该家庭暴力指控确如预期被撤销。

该事件引发了人们对联邦移民执法政策的担忧，特别是这些政策如何影响DACA受益人以及司法系统的顺畅运作。雷耶斯的法律团队（来自罗杰威廉姆斯大学法学院移民诊所）目前正致力于永久解除ICE的拘留令。吉布尼法官强调了像雷耶斯这样DACA受益人对社区的宝贵贡献，并强调了此类错误拘留的更广泛影响。雷耶斯此后已被释放。

title: More tales about outages and numeric limits
summary:
The article "More tales about outages and numeric limits" by Rachel by the Bay explores how reaching numeric limits, particularly with integers, can trigger significant system outages. The author recounts an incident where a system failed because it hit the maximum value for a 32-bit signed integer storing a timestamp. This caused dates beyond a certain point to "roll over" and be interpreted as values far in the past, leading services to stop processing new data.

The piece emphasizes that outages are rarely caused by a single, obvious bug. Instead, they often result from a complex interplay of factors, including: overlooked numeric limits (like 32-bit vs. 64-bit integers or signed vs. unsigned interpretations), inadequate monitoring that fails to detect critical states, intricate system interdependencies where one failure cascades, and implicit assumptions made by developers about data ranges or time representation.

Testing for these "far future" or "too big" edge cases is inherently difficult during development. The article underscores the importance of proactive system design that anticipates such limitations, robust monitoring to catch anomalies early, and a thorough understanding of how different components interact and depend on each other. Ultimately, these "numeric limit" failures are a recurring, subtle, yet potent cause of unexpected downtime.
chinese_title: 更多停机与数值限制的故事
chinese_summary:
Rachel by the Bay 所撰写的文章《故障与数字限制的更多故事》探讨了达到数字限制（特别是整数限制）如何引发重大的系统中断。作者讲述了一个系统故障的案例，原因是一个存储时间戳的32位有符号整数达到了其最大值。这导致某个时间点之后的日期“翻转”，被错误地解读为遥远的过去的值，从而使得服务停止处理新数据。

文章强调，系统中断很少是由单一、明显的错误引起的。相反，它们往往是多种复杂因素相互作用的结果，包括：被忽视的数字限制（例如32位与64位整数的区别，或有符号与无符号的解释差异），未能检测到关键状态的不足的监控，一个故障可能引发连锁反应的复杂系统依赖关系，以及开发者对数据范围或时间表示所做的隐式假设。

在开发过程中，测试这些“遥远的未来”或“过大”的边界情况本质上是困难的。文章强调了主动式系统设计的重要性，即预先考虑到此类限制，实施强大的监控以尽早发现异常，并透彻理解不同组件如何相互作用和依赖。最终，这些“数字限制”故障是导致意外停机的一个反复出现、不易察觉但却威力巨大的原因。

title: The AI bubble is bigger than you think
summary:
The article warns of a looming financial crash driven by a massive AI bubble, fueled by a collaboration between Silicon Valley and Wall Street through sketchy credit deals. The colossal investment required for AI infrastructure, such as GPUs and data centers—projected to need $2 trillion in annual revenue by decade's end—is being financed largely by "private credit" funds. These unregulated non-bank lenders, rebranded from "shadow banks," now manage $1.6 trillion in assets.

Big Tech firms, aiming to avoid debt on their balance sheets, leverage "Special Purpose Vehicles" (SPVs) to construct data centers. These SPVs secure Big Tech as "anchor tenants" and then issue debt, implicitly guaranteeing repayment to investors via Big Tech payments. For example, Blue Owl, a private credit fund, finances Meta’s Hyperion data center via such an SPV, with Meta holding a minority stake.

However, numerous red flags are emerging: AI GPUs have very short lifespans (often less than two years due to rapid obsolescence and intense use) but are being depreciated over much longer periods, leading to overstated revenues. This risks creating "stranded assets" in data centers and power plants. Securitization of data center loans further exacerbates the risk by packaging rapidly depreciating assets.

Critically, the enormous projected revenue needed to justify current AI investments is nowhere in sight, with major AI players like OpenAI losing billions. The industry's self-reinforcing financial model, where cloud providers subsidize AI model training, is described as a classic bubble. The author likens the situation to a dangerous combination of the 2000s housing bubble's financial engineering, 1920s unregulated lending, and the scale of 1990s tech expansion. While private credit is central, traditional banks, private equity, and even ordinary 401(k) investors are increasingly exposed. Experts and key players are quietly exiting, signaling deep instability.
chinese_title: AI泡沫比你想象的要大
chinese_summary:
这篇文章警告称，一场由巨大AI泡沫驱动、迫在眉睫的金融危机正在逼近，这一泡沫是由硅谷和华尔街通过可疑的信贷交易合作助长的。AI基础设施（如GPU和数据中心）所需的巨额投资——预计到本十年末每年需要2万亿美元的营收——主要由“私募信贷”基金提供资金。这些不受监管的非银行贷款机构，从“影子银行”更名而来，目前管理着1.6万亿美元的资产。

title: Git 3.0 Defaults to "main" Branch Instead of "master
summary:
Git 2.52 has been released, introducing new features and significant preparations for the upcoming Git 3.0, expected by the end of 2026.

A pivotal change slated for Git 3.0 is the adoption of "main" as the default branch name, replacing "master." Git 2.52 integrates new hints to assist users with this transition, also detailing how to rename branches back to "master" if desired.

Another major development for Git 3.0 involves transitioning from SHA1 hashing to SHA256. Git 2.52 initiates this effort with early SHA1-SHA256 interoperability work, aiming for a smooth transition by Git 3.0's release.

Beyond these forward-looking preparations, Git 2.52 brings its own set of enhancements. These include improvements to various Git sub-commands, the introduction of a new "git repo" sub-command for repository characteristics, and a "git last-modified" sub-command to show the closest ancestor commit for each path. The release also features general performance improvements, bug fixes, and other incremental updates. Further details can be found in the official release highlights and on the GitHub Blog.

title: Trump administration eliminates protections for endangered species
summary:
The Trump administration is proposing to roll back protections under the Endangered Species Act (ESA), reviving changes previously blocked. Key proposals include eliminating the "blanket rule" that automatically protects threatened species, requiring time-consuming species-specific rules instead. Additionally, officials would analyze economic impacts when designating critical habitat, and the definition of "harm" under the ESA may be revised to potentially bypass protections for logging.

These changes are supported by Republicans and industries like oil, gas, mining, and agriculture, who argue the ESA impedes economic growth. Interior Secretary Doug Burgum stated the revisions restore the ESA's original intent, provide certainty, and respect American livelihoods.

Environmentalists and scientists, however, warn the changes could cause years-long delays in conservation efforts, accelerating extinctions for species like the monarch butterfly and Florida manatee. They argue the proposals undermine protections, citing cases like the Yarrow's spiny lizard, where economic analysis could delay critical habitat designation for climate-threatened species. The ESA has historically been credited with saving 99% of listed species, including the bald eagle, but global extinctions are accelerating due to habitat loss and climate change. Past Trump administration rollbacks on species like the northern spotted owl were later reversed.
chinese_title: 特朗普政府废除濒危物种保护措施

这些修改得到了共和党人以及石油、天然气、采矿和农业等行业的支持，他们认为ESA阻碍了经济增长。内政部长道格·伯格姆表示，这些修订旨在恢复ESA的初衷，提供确定性，并尊重美国人民的生计。

然而，环保人士和科学家警告称，这些改变可能导致保护工作多年的延误，加速帝王蝶和佛罗里达海牛等物种的灭绝。他们认为这些提案削弱了保护，并引用了例如亚罗氏棘蜥的案例，其中经济分析可能延迟受气候威胁物种的关键栖息地划定。ESA历史上被认为拯救了99%的列名物种，包括白头海雕，但由于栖息地丧失和气候变化，全球物种灭绝正在加速。特朗普政府过去对北方斑点猫头鹰等物种的撤销保护措施后来被推翻。

title: Jack Ma's family shifted wealth to UK after years-long 'disappearance'
summary:
Jack Ma's wife, Cathy Ying Zhang, purchased a £19.5 million mansion in London's Belgravia district in October 2024, marking the family's first known property holding in the UK. This acquisition occurred amid Jack Ma's gradual return to public life after years of "disappearance" and scrutiny following his 2020 criticism of China's financial system.

Analysts view the purchase as a "precautionary diversification" against "regime risk," a growing trend among wealthy Chinese families seeking to hedge against potential hostile policies and asset freezes by moving wealth to "rule of law societies." Zhang, who has acquired Singaporean citizenship, has also invested in properties in Singapore and is linked to offshore companies for French assets. The London purchase, potentially funded by Alibaba share sales in 2023, was reportedly rushed through ahead of a rise in the UK's stamp duty surcharge for overseas buyers.

Ma resurfaced in China in 2023 after being reportedly fined nearly $3 billion and having Ant Group's IPO halted. While he has since met President Xi Jinping, his public remarks remain unreported by state media, suggesting he may not be "completely rehabilitated." Allegations also surfaced that Chinese authorities enlisted Ma to pressure a dissident businessman. This shift of wealth follows previous international property acquisitions by the Ma family in Hong Kong and New York in 2015.

title: Cryptographers cancel election results after losing decryption key
summary:
The International Association of Cryptologic Research (IACR) has canceled its annual leadership election results because a trustee lost a critical decryption key. The election was conducted using Helios, an open-source voting system designed to be verifiable, confidential, and privacy-preserving through advanced cryptography.

Helios encrypts each vote, and to ensure security and prevent collusion, the decryption key material was split among three independent election committee trustees, each holding one-third. Unfortunately, one trustee, Moti Yung, "irretrievably lost their private key." This "honest but unfortunate human mistake" rendered it technically impossible to complete the decryption process and verify the election's outcome.

As a result, the IACR has canceled the election. To prevent similar incidents, the organization will adopt a new key management mechanism, requiring only two of the three key chunks for future decryptions. Moti Yung has resigned and been replaced by Michel Abdalla.

The IACR, a nonprofit scientific organization dedicated to cryptology research, is now holding a new election, which began Friday and runs through December 20.

因此，IACR取消了此次选举。为了防止类似事件再次发生，该组织将采用一种新的密钥管理机制，未来解密时只需三个密钥分块中的两个即可。Moti Yung已辞职，并由Michel Abdalla接替。

title: How/why to sweep async tasks under a Postgres table
summary:
The article advocates "sweeping" asynchronous task complexity under a PostgreSQL table, promoting "slim and stupid" servers that prioritize fast, dumb database queries for smooth user experiences. It argues against mixing multiple external systems (like SQS, Redis, Celery) for task management, which often leads to distributed state, painful debugging, and the "sin" of handrolling two-phase commits.

Instead, Postgres, with its robust transaction guarantees, is proposed as the central "source of truth." It can effectively act as a unified platform for queues, pipelines, and async data, eliminating entire classes of errors. This approach fosters "TODO-Driven Development" by tracking incomplete or unimplemented tasks directly in the database, and enhances "Human Fault Tolerance" by letting computers manage complex retries.

The implementation involves a `task` table (with `task_type` and `params` as `jsonb`) and a worker process. This worker continuously fetches and deletes tasks using `DELETE ... FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED LIMIT 1` within a transaction. Key features include: automatic task retry on failure (due to transaction rollback), support for parallel workers via `SKIP LOCKED`, resilience through random task ordering (or prioritized queues), and preventing overzealous polling with delays.
chinese_title: 如何/为何将异步任务归集到Postgres表中处理
chinese_summary:
该文章倡导将异步任务的复杂性收敛到一个PostgreSQL表中，推广“精简愚笨”的服务器，这些服务器优先进行快速、简单的数据库查询以提供流畅的用户体验。文章反对将多个外部系统（如 SQS、Redis、Celery）混合用于任务管理，因为这常常导致分布式状态、痛苦的调试以及“手搓”两阶段提交的“罪恶”。

相反，Postgres 凭借其强大的事务保证，被提议作为中心的“单一事实来源”。它能有效地充当队列、管道和异步数据的统一平台，从而消除了一整类错误。这种方法通过直接在数据库中跟踪未完成或未实现的任务，促进了“待办事项驱动开发”（TODO-Driven Development），并通过让计算机管理复杂的重试，增强了“人为容错性”（Human Fault Tolerance）。

具体实现包括一个 `task` 表（其中 `task_type` 和 `params` 字段为 `jsonb` 类型）以及一个工作进程。这个工作进程在一个事务中，持续地使用 `DELETE ... FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED LIMIT 1` 语句获取并删除任务。主要特点包括：任务失败时自动重试（得益于事务回滚）、通过 `SKIP LOCKED` 支持并行工作进程、通过随机任务排序（或优先级队列）增强弹性，以及通过延迟来防止过度频繁的轮询。

title: Microsoft AI CEO Puzzled by People Being Unimpressed by AI

title: Measuring Latency (2015)
summary:
This article, based on Gil Tene's work, asserts that common latency measurement tools and methodologies are fundamentally flawed, often misrepresenting system performance. Latency is the time for a single operation, meaning its behavior must be described by its *complete distribution*, not just averages or medians, which are useless for multi-modal systems exhibiting "hiccups" (e.g., GC pauses).

Many tools inadequately capture data, fixating on "common cases" like the 95th percentile, which can be irrelevant to most users. Averaging percentiles is mathematically unsound, and the maximum latency, often dismissed as noise, is a critical signal. The 99th percentile is not rare; many users frequently encounter it. Monitoring systems often lack the fidelity to capture critical "nines" (e.g., 99.999th percentile) due to data summarization.

The most prevalent issue is "coordinated omission." This occurs when load generators or monitoring code inadvertently ignore or miss bad latency events. For example, a load generator might delay sending requests when the system is slow, or monitoring might only record a long operation once, effectively hiding queueing delays. This omission drastically skews results, making problematic systems appear perfect and sometimes making real improvements look like regressions. A "CTRL+Z" test can expose this. Coordinated omission measures service time, not true response time.

To properly measure latency, one must understand the entire distribution, especially tail latencies, and test under various loads between idle and saturation. Tools like HdrHistogram can capture high-resolution data and correct for coordinated omission. The core message is to be deeply critical of reported latency numbers, recognizing their potential to mislead.
chinese_title: 测量延迟 (2015)
chinese_summary:
本文基于 Gil Tene 的研究指出，常见的延迟测量工具和方法存在根本性缺陷，常常错误地反映系统性能。延迟是单个操作所需的时间，这意味着其行为必须通过其**完整分布**来描述，而非仅仅通过平均值或中位数；对于表现出“打嗝”（例如，GC 暂停）的多模式系统而言，这些平均值或中位数是无用的。

许多工具无法充分捕获数据，专注于“常见情况”，例如第95百分位，这可能与大多数用户无关。对百分位数求平均在数学上是不严谨的，而最大延迟，通常被视为噪声，实则是一个关键信号。第99百分位并不罕见；许多用户会频繁遇到它。由于数据汇总，监控系统通常缺乏足够的精度来捕获关键的“N个9”（例如，99.999百分位）。

最普遍的问题是“协调遗漏”。当负载生成器或监控代码无意中忽略或遗漏了糟糕的延迟事件时，就会发生这种情况。例如，当系统变慢时，负载生成器可能会延迟发送请求，或者监控可能只记录一次长时间操作，从而有效地隐藏了排队延迟。这种遗漏会严重扭曲结果，使有问题系统看起来完美，有时甚至使实际的改进看起来像是性能退化。“CTRL+Z”测试可以揭示这一点。协调遗漏衡量的是服务时间，而非真正的响应时间。

为了准确测量延迟，必须了解整个分布，尤其是尾部延迟，并在空闲到饱和之间的各种负载下进行测试。HdrHistogram 等工具可以捕获高分辨率数据并纠正协调遗漏问题。核心信息是对报告的延迟数据持高度批判态度，认识到它们可能具有误导性。

title: Microsoft Will Preload Windows 11 File Explorer to Fix Bad Performance
summary:
Microsoft has released Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26220.7271 for both Dev and Beta Channels, based on version 25H2. Insiders currently have a temporary window to switch from the Dev to Beta Channel.

This build introduces several new features and improvements. Key additions include the Xbox full screen experience (FSE) for PC, offering console-style navigation for controller-first gaming. A new point-in-time restore feature allows users to quickly roll back their device to a previous state for easier troubleshooting and reduced downtime. Fluid Dictation has been added to Voice Typing for NPU devices, providing smoother dictation with automatic grammar, punctuation, and filler word corrections.

Improvements include enhanced app continuity, allowing users of specific Android phones (Honor, Huawei, Oppo, Samsung, vivo) to seamlessly resume Spotify tracks, browser activity, and M365 Copilot files from their phone to PC. File Explorer receives context menu refinements for better organization. Crucially, Microsoft is exploring **preloading File Explorer in the background to improve launch performance**, with an option to disable this feature available in Folder Options. The Microsoft Store now also allows uninstalling apps directly from the library page. The update also addresses various bug fixes across the OS and lists several known issues.
